meaningMnemonic: Your <radical>fingers</radical> grasp this <radical>lid</radical> and when you raise it you see a <radical>poop</radical> <radical>turkey</radical> (a turkey covered in poop). You can't help yourself, you <kanji>embrace</kanji> the turkey.
readingMnemonic: As you <kanji>embrace</kanji> the sad turkey it makes a funny sound and suddenly starts pooping <reading>yo</reading>gurt (よう) all over you. But you don't want to stop embracing it! It's probably just scared still. But the more you squeeze, the faster the yogurt comes out of it!
